content.title: The Void Lands
content.body:
Legends tell of a strange, unexplored area; known to few, and survived by even fewer. The great Ender Dragon rules this realm with an iron fist, and the few subjects who escape are prone to being killed while trying to get help for their kin.
The legends also tell of ancient cities only found on the very edges of this realm, full of the loot from times long past.
Magical items, ancient scrolls of power, and strange monsters; said to use magic to disable their foes. All of this and more resides within this ancient and mysterious realm.
